chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Your Response:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

Your Response:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
None

Goal:
forall (p : nat) (l : list (nat * nat)), is_prime p -> is_wf l -> divides (refactor l) p -> exists m : nat, In (p, m) l

Premises:
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
is_prime = fun p : nat => p <> 1 /\ (forall d : nat, divides p d -> d = 1 \/ d = p) : nat -> Prop Arguments is_prime _%nat_scope
In : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> Prop
divides = fun a b : nat => exists q : nat, a = b * q : nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments divides (_ _)%nat_scope
refactor = fix refactor (l : list (nat * nat)) : nat := match l with | nil => 1 | (p, n) :: tail => power p n * refactor tail end : list (nat * nat) -> nat Arguments refactor _%list_scope
Inductive is_wf : list (nat * nat) -> Prop := nil_is_wf : is_wf nil | cons_is_wf : forall (p n : nat) (tail : list (nat * nat)), is_prime p -> n > 0 -> is_wf tail -> rel_prime p (refactor tail) -> is_wf ((p, n) :: tail) Arguments is_wf _%list_scope Arguments cons_is_wf (_ _)%nat_scope _%list_scope
is_wf_sind : forall P : list (nat * nat) -> SProp, P nil -> (forall (p n : nat) (tail : list (nat * nat)), is_prime p -> n > 0 -> is_wf tail -> P tail -> rel_prime p (refactor tail) -> P ((p, n) :: tail)) -> forall l : list (nat * nat), is_wf l -> P l
is_wf_ind : forall P : list (nat * nat) -> Prop, P nil -> (forall (p n : nat) (tail : list (nat * nat)), is_prime p -> n > 0 -> is_wf tail -> P tail -> rel_prime p (refactor tail) -> P ((p, n) :: tail)) -> forall l : list (nat * nat), is_wf l -> P l
factor_divides_refactor : forall (x : nat * nat) (l : list (nat * nat)), In x l -> divides (refactor l) (power (fst x) (snd x))
cons_is_wf : forall (p n : nat) (tail : list (nat * nat)), is_prime p -> n > 0 -> is_wf tail -> rel_prime p (refactor tail) -> is_wf ((p, n) :: tail)
Inductive is_wf : list (nat * nat) -> Prop := nil_is_wf : is_wf nil | cons_is_wf : forall (p n : nat) (tail : list (nat * nat)), is_prime p -> n > 0 -> is_wf tail -> rel_prime p (refactor tail) -> is_wf ((p, n) :: tail) Arguments is_wf _%list_scope Arguments cons_is_wf (_ _)%nat_scope _%list_scope
ZMicromega.max_var_nformulae_correct_aux : forall (l : list (EnvRing.Pol Z * RingMicromega.Op1)) (p : EnvRing.Pol Z) (o : RingMicromega.Op1) (v : positive), In (p, o) l -> In v (ZMicromega.vars 1 p) -> (v <= fold_left ZMicromega.F l 1)%positive
ZMicromega.max_var_nformalae_correct : forall (l : list (EnvRing.Pol Z * RingMicromega.Op1)) (p : EnvRing.Pol Z) (o : RingMicromega.Op1) (v : positive), In (p, o) l -> In v (ZMicromega.vars 1 p) -> (v <= ZMicromega.max_var_nformulae l)%positive
in_split_r : forall (A B : Type) (l : list (A * B)) (p : A * B), In p l -> In (snd p) (snd (split l))
in_split_l : forall (A B : Type) (l : list (A * B)) (p : A * B), In p l -> In (fst p) (fst (split l))
in_or_app : forall (A : Type) (l m : list A) (a : A), In a l \/ In a m -> In a (l ++ m)
in_app_or : forall (A : Type) (l m : list A) (a : A), In a (l ++ m) -> In a l \/ In a m
in_prod : forall (A B : Type) (l : list A) (l' : list B) (x : A) (y : B), In x l -> In y l' -> In (x, y) (list_prod l l')
in_prod_aux : forall (A B : Type) (x : A) (y : B) (l : list B), In y l -> In (x, y) (map (fun y0 : B => (x, y0)) l)
in_combine_l : forall (A B : Type) (l : list A) (l' : list B) (x : A) (y : B), In (x, y) (combine l l') -> In x l
list_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> Prop), P nil -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A), P l -> P (a :: l)) -> forall l : list A, P l
factorisation : forall n : nat, {l : list (nat * nat) | is_wf l /\ n = refactor l} + {n = 0}
prime_square : forall p a : nat, is_prime p -> divides (square a) p -> divides a p
in_combine_r : forall (A B : Type) (l : list A) (l' : list B) (x : A) (y : B), In (x, y) (combine l l') -> In y l'
prime_mult : forall p a b : nat, is_prime p -> divides (a * b) p -> divides a p \/ divides b p
nat_factor : forall n p : nat, is_prime p -> n <> 0 -> {m : nat | divides n (power p m) /\ ~ divides n (power p (m + 1))}
prime_power : forall p n x : nat, is_prime p -> divides (power x n) p -> divides x p
prime_div_gcd : forall p a : nat, is_prime p -> ~ divides a p -> rel_prime p a
prime_rel_prime : forall p a : nat, is_prime p -> ~ rel_prime a p -> divides a p
in_map_iff : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l : list A) (y : B), In y (map f l) < -> (exists x : A, f x = y /\ In x l)
in_prod_iff : forall (A B : Type) (l : list A) (l' : list B) (x : A) (y : B), In (x, y) (list_prod l l') < -> In x l /\ In y l'
prime_power_qn : forall p n q x : nat, is_prime p -> divides (power x n) (power p (q * n)) -> 1 <= n -> divides x (power p q)
fast_OMEGA16 : forall (v c l k : Z) (P : Z -> Prop), P (v * (c * k) + l * k)%Z -> P ((v * c + l) * k)%Z
divides_prime : forall a : nat, (exists p : nat, p <> a /\ is_prime p /\ divides a p) -> ~ is_prime a
prime_cond : forall p : nat, p <> 1 /\ (forall a : nat, a <> 1 -> a <> p -> ~ divides p a) < -> is_prime p
ZMicromega.max_var_nformulae_mono_aux : forall (l : list (EnvRing.Pol Z * RingMicromega.Op1)) (v acc : positive), (v <= acc)%positive -> (v <= fold_left ZMicromega.F l acc)%positive

```coq
intros p l H_prime H_wf H_divides.
destruct (factorisation p) as [l' [(H_wf', H_refactor)]|H_zero].
{ apply (cons_is_wf _ _ _ _ H_prime _ H_wf H_divides) in H_wf'.
  apply is_wf_sind with (P := fun l => exists m : nat, In (p, m) l).
  - intros.
    rewrite H_refactor.
    apply in_split_l in H_divides.
    destruct H_divides as [H_p [H_n H_divides]].
    exists n.
    apply in_prod_iff.
    split; [apply in_split_r|].
    apply in_split_l in H_divides.
    destruct H_divides as [H_p [H_n H_divides]].
    apply H_divides.
  - intros.
    rewrite H_refactor.
    apply in_split_l in H_divides.
    destruct H_divides as [H_p [H_n H_divides]].
    apply H_divides.
  - apply H_wf'.
}
{ contradiction. }
Qed.

original: intros p l H_prime H_wf H_divides. destruct (factorisation p) as [l' [(H_wf', H_refactor)]|H_zero]. { apply (cons_is_wf _ _ _ _ H_prime _ H_wf H_divides) in H_wf'. apply is_wf_sind with (P := fun l => exists m : nat, In (p, m) l). - intros. rewrite H_refactor. apply in_split_l in H_divides. destruct H_divides as [H_p [H_n H_divides]]. exists n. apply in_prod_iff. split; [apply in_split_r|]. apply in_split_l in H_divides. destruct H_divides as [H_p [H_n H_divides]]. apply H_divides. - intros. rewrite H_refactor. apply in_split_l in H_divides. destruct H_divides as [H_p [H_n H_divides]]. apply H_divides. - apply H_wf'. } { contradiction. }
